证据片段: Zirconium alloys absorb up to 5 atomic percent hydrogen in solid solution at temperatures ≥ 775 K (500°C)

证据片段: The solubility of hydrogen in zirconium at 575 K (302°C) is about 60 ppm

文献ID: STP824-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_6th Volume_018_chunk3
证据片段: In zirconium alloys with equiaxed α grains >10×10^-3 mm diameter the hydrides precipitate either at grain boundaries or within the grains on the habit plane
